summary: Referral-based website for Pinterest account business where visitors are redirected through affiliate/referral links
architectural_notes: Website uses referral/affiliate link model for monetization
Pinterest Tag (conversion tracking pixel) integration with tag ID 2614024734220

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that showcases the Pinterest account business with a hero section, business description, and call-to-action to view the portfolio
Build a portfolio gallery section that displays Pinterest board previews with images, titles, and descriptions
Create a services section that outlines what the Pinterest account business offers to clients
Implement a contact form that allows potential clients to reach out, capturing name, email, and message
Add a testimonials or social proof section to build credibility for the Pinterest account business
Create a navigation menu that allows users to easily move between sections of the website
Design the website with a creative visual theme that reflects Pinterest's aesthetic with warm, earthy tones, elegant typography, and a clean, image-focused layout that emphasizes visual storytelling

Replace the current portfolio gallery section with a referral links showcase that displays clickable cards, each representing a Pinterest board or product that redirects users through tracked referral links
Implement click tracking functionality that increments a counter when users click on referral links and redirects them to the target URL
Update the hero section call-to-action to emphasize browsing curated Pinterest recommendations instead of viewing a portfolio
Update the services section to describe the value proposition of curated referral links and recommendations instead of Pinterest account management services
Generate a product thumbnail image for the new Amazon referral link that visually represents the hair care or skin care product
Add the Pinterest Tag tracking script to the HTML document head, loading the Pinterest conversion tracking library from https://s.pinimg.com/ct/core.js and initializing it with tag ID '2614024734220'
Configure the Pinterest Tag to track page views automatically when the site loads

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store referral links with fields including link ID, title, description, category, target URL, thumbnail image path, and click count
Seed the backend with initial referral link data including at least three sample Pinterest referral links with titles, descriptions, categories, and target URLs

Add a new referral link entry to the backend with the Amazon affiliate URL 'https://amzn.to/3OzRf1C', categorized under either hair care or skin care, with an appropriate product title and description
Integrate Pinterest Tag tracking code into the website to enable conversion tracking and analytics
